name: Paper towel cat
description: A new type of paper towel, the forepart is the shape of cat. You can put it on your head and use it in emergency but please care not to pull out the head of kitty.

name: Parcel Hat
description: Item commonly used by mid middle-aged women when they carry around stuffs. The plenty use of watermark patterns is its feature.

name: Participation Chest
description: In order to encourage Braves to participate in battles, the kingdom has made gift boxes for every participant to have a reward.

name: Particle Slicer
description: Light and deadly, this dagger's blade is made of particles. It can cut through any means of protection.

name: Parts
description: As a single inseparable piece of an unknown machine, this is a rare item that can be used to make high-end headwear.

name: Party Horn
description: It's for the party flaver. But that is too loud! I'm going to be deaf now!

name: Party Recruiter Hat
description: Hat that resembles a billboard that writes recruit info of team member. Everyone works hard to upgrade the level!

description: Hat that resembles a billboard that writes recruit info of team member. Everyone works hard to upgrade the level!

name: Party Recruiter Hat [1]
description: The helmet with recruiting advertisement on it. Work hard, everybody!

name: Passed Time A
description: Epona in this picture was embracing an ugly big man, the time monster Syrono. Ebona did not care for the man's appearance, Her eyes were filled with love, she was smiling and staring at Syrono. The photographer betrayed them and their eyes and tongue were cut off.

name: Passed Time B
description: A metal pocket watch, Burned in roasting, Was actually Syrono's heart. Since Syrono met Epona, the heart had stopped beating, and he wished time could freeze at the moment they encountered. Syrono gave the watch to Ebona, she kept it in her pocket until she was executed. In the blazing fire, the dial of Syrono's watch broke into dust.

name: Past Time
effect: Def ＋15,When Refining ＋10 and Luck reaches 90, Crit.Dmg ＋5%

name: Pauldron
description: The hard round armour provides extra defense to the shoulders.

name: Pauldron [1]
description: The hard round armour provides extra defense to the shoulders.

name: Pauldron [2]
description: The armor removed from armor to be a protective bag, with considerable defensive force.
